primary.comment: Primary data visualization color, used for showing total value or whenever only 1 color is needed in a visualization.

graph.comment: Semantic color used to show positive or successful changes in graphs

text.comment: Semantic color used for text or icons related to positive or successful info in graphs

graph.comment: Semantic color used to show negative changes in graphs

text.comment: Semantic color used for text or icons related to negative info in graphs
